Uses of Package
xxl.core.io.converters

  • Packages that use xxl.core.io.converters 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers
    Provides some containers.
    xxl.core.collections.containers.io
    Provides some containers that are able to store their blocks on disk.
    xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
    Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.
    xxl.core.collections.queues.io
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
    xxl.core.cursors
    The package xxl.core.cursors provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes Iterator and Enumeration.
    xxl.core.cursors.identities
    The package xxl.core.cursors.identities provides miscellaneous implementations of identity operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.sources.io
    The package xxl.core.cursors.sources.io provides miscellaneous implementations of source operators that use I/O operations to retrieve their data.
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.indexStructures.rtrees  
    xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree
    Experimental Package for variable length B+tree implementation.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.
    xxl.core.io.converters
    This package provides a larger collection of converters, e.g. a complete collection of converters for the primitive data types, strings and arrays of these types.
    xxl.core.io.converters.meta  
    xxl.core.relational.cursors
    The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors.
    xxl.core.relational.metaData
    This package provides the classes that are needed for describing the metadata of the relational algebra operators.
    xxl.core.relational.resultSets  
    xxl.core.relational.tuples  
    xxl.core.spatial
    Support data types and building-blocks for spatial, temporal and mining algorithms (e.g. similarity joins)
    xxl.core.spatial.converters
    Provides tools for converting Point and Key Pointer Elements that are stored in ASCII-format to a binary representation.
    xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils  
    xxl.core.spatial.points
    Implemetns the base type Point for all data that deals with points of arbitrary dimensions and wrappers for double[], float[] and fixed-mantissa points.
    xxl.core.spatial.rectangles
    Implemetns the base type Rectangle for high-dimensional rectangle objects (hyper-cubes) and extentions for different coordinate types (double, float, long).
    xxl.core.spatial.spatialBPlusTree  
    xxl.core.util
    This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.collections.containers 
    Class and Description
    FixedSizeConverter
    This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.collections.containers.io 
    Class and Description
    Converter
    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
    Converters.SerializationMode
    Represents the different DataOutput resp.
    FixedSizeConverter
    This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager 
    Class and Description
    Converter
    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
    FixedSizeConverter
    This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes.
    MapConverter
    This class represents a converter for objects of type Map.
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.collections.queues.io 
    Class and Description
    Converter
    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).

    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).

    This is a converter which can convert objects with a known maximal size.

  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.io 
    Class and Description
    Converter
    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
  • Classes in xxl.core.io.converters used by xxl.core.io.converters 
    Class and Description
    AsciiConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Character objects as ASCII characters (the byte values representing the ASCII character).
    BigDecimalConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write BigDecimal objects.
    BigIntegerConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write BigInteger objects.
    BooleanArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of boolean values.
    BooleanConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Boolean objects.
    ByteArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of byte values.
    ByteArrayZipConverter
    This class provides a converter that converts a byte array into a zip compressed byte array representation and vice versa.
    ByteConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Byte objects.
    CharacterArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of char values.
    CharacterConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Character objects.
    ConvertableConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Convertable interface.
    Converter
    The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
    Converters.SerializationMode
    Represents the different DataOutput resp.
    DateConverter
    A Converter for object of type Date.
    DoubleArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of double values.
    DoubleConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Double objects.
    FixedSizeConverter
    This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes.
    FloatArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of float values.
    FloatConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Float objects.
    IntegerArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of int values.
    IntegerConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Integer objects.
    LongArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of long values.
    LongConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Long objects.
    MeasuredConverter
    This is a converter which can convert objects with a known maximal size.
    MultiConverter
    Converts an object with multiple convertable fields into a byte representation and vice versa.
    SerializableConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Serializable interface.
    ShortArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of short values.
    ShortConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Short objects.
    SizeConverter
    This abstract class represents a special kind of converter which provides a method which returns the size of an object in bytes before doing the serialization.
    StringArrayConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of String objects.
    StringBufferConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write string buffers.
    StringConverter
    This class provides a converter that is able to read and write String objects.
    TimeConverter
    A Converter for object of type Time.
    TimestampConverter
    A Converter for object of type Timestamp.
